scripts.test1: del test.decoded.hex & del test.encoded.wav & node decode -i test.orig.wav -o test.decoded.hex --noheader & FC /B test.orig.hex test.decoded.hex
scripts.test2: del test.decoded.hex & del test.encoded.wav & node encode -i test.orig.hex -o test.encoded.wav -a 0 -b  300 & node decode -i test.encoded.wav -o test.decoded.hex --noheader -b  300 & FC /B test.orig.hex test.decoded.hex
scripts.test3: del test.decoded.hex & del test.encoded.wav & node encode -i test.orig.hex -o test.encoded.wav -a 0 -b  600 & node decode -i test.encoded.wav -o test.decoded.hex --noheader -b  600 & FC /B test.orig.hex test.decoded.hex
scripts.test4: del test.decoded.hex & del test.encoded.wav & node encode -i test.orig.hex -o test.encoded.wav -a 0 -b 1200 & node decode -i test.encoded.wav -o test.decoded.hex --noheader -b 1200 & FC /B test.orig.hex test.decoded.hex
